entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson Studies about the coronavirus and increases in states show that areas supporting Trump have the largest number of new cases.  Dr. John Ross, a professor at Harvard Medical School, pointed out that all but one of the top 10 counties that saw the largest increases voted for Trump.
